Network traffic indicating a user naviga.Action: Monitor Zeek http.log and conn.log for connections to known malicious domains/IPs from threat intelligence feeds. Analyze HTTP referrer headers to identify if the traffic originated from an email link. Use descriptive statistics and correlation analysis to identify users/endpoints with an unusually high frequency of connections to suspicious domains.

Log entries showing a file was downloade.Data: Zeek http.log, Zeek fileinfo.log, Windows Event ID 4688
Log entries showing a file was downloade.Action: Correlate Zeek http.log entries showing file downloads (based on content type or file extension) immediately following connections to suspicious URLs (from Evidence 1). Analyze Zeek fileinfo.log for details about downloaded files. Cross-reference download times with Windows Event ID 4688 logs on the corresponding endpoint to identify immediate process creation events for the downloaded file name. Use time series analysis to identify clusters of file download/execution events after suspicious web activity.
